text: Here is a list of the hottest and coldest temperatures ever recorded in various locations in Sweden since 1860. Due to the continental nature of the Swedish climate, the entire country is prone to absolute extremes, even though averages are normally moderate in most of the country. ==Highest temperatures ever recorded in Sweden== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" |- ! Temperature ! Location !
